rooms.description: A spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light and an open layout connecting to the outdoor terrace.
Modern kitchen equipped with high-end appliances and storage, integrated into the living space.
Luxury bedroom featuring a private balcony that adheres to Vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow.
Well-equipped bathroom with sufficient space and fixtures for comfort and functionality.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window offering natural light and enhanced ventilation.
Primary entrance door following modern design aesthetics and safety norms.

additional_features.description: A private outdoor terrace adjoining the living area with Mediterranean style finishes.
Balcony attached to the bedroom enhancing the luxury feel and offering a view in accordance with Vastu principles.
